title: Authors and Citation
text: Kainu M (2024). digitransit: client digitransit API services. R package version 0.1.1,  https://github.com/rOpenGov/digitransit, https://ropengov.github.io/digitransit/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {digitransit: A client for digitransit API services},   author = {Markus Kainu},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.1,  https://github.com/rOpenGov/digitransit},   url = {https://ropengov.github.io/digitransit/}, }

title: A client for digitransit API services
text: API documentation: https://digitransit.fi/en/developers/apis/2-geocoding-api/ Install Use © Markus Kainu 2018 License: MIT
code: remotes::install_git("https://github.com/ropengov/digitransit") digitransit::geocode("Eduskuntatalo") #   string      lon     lat                                       label # 1 Eduskuntatalo 24.93315 60.1725 Eduskuntatalo, Mannerheimintie 30, Helsinki digitransit::reverse_geocode(lon = 24.93315, lat = 60.1725) # lon     lat country country_a  region localadmin locality                        label # 1 24.93315 60.1725   Suomi       FIN Uusimaa   Helsinki Helsinki Mannerheimintie 30, Helsinki

what: Geocode a place name or an address — geocode

text: string plane name address hits Number hits returned host Define host, instance http://localhost:3100 running docker container locally

title: Geocode a place name or an address — geocode
Geocode a place name or an address — geocode
code: geocode(string = "Eduskuntatalo", hits = 1) #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. #> Error in tmp[[3]]: subscript out of bounds

code: reverse_geocode(lon = "24.95126", lat = "60.15948", hits = 1) #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. #> Error in tmp[[3]]: subscript out of bounds
